dialogue: Maybe I could permanently work at home.
No problem. I just need a few things from you to make sure you are working.
Well, obviously, I need frequent status reports.
And I'll need to track your keystrokes and your phone's location.
Wow. Well, okay. I guess I can get used to that in return for my freedom to work at home.
Now that I've loosened you up, let's talk about fitting you for a body cam.
